meanings.sent1: Her ostentatiousness in wearing expensive jewelry made her stand out.
meanings.sent2: The ostentatiousness of his outfit drew attention at the party.
meanings.sent3: Despite her ostentatiousness, she was actually quite humble.
meanings.sent4: The ostentatiousness of the mansion was a symbol of wealth and status.
meanings.sent5: The ostentatiousness of the fireworks display left everyone in awe.

meanings.definition: The act of showing off in a flashy or excessive manner.
meanings.sent1: His ostentatiousness in bragging about his accomplishments annoyed his friends.
meanings.sent2: The ostentatiousness of her car collection was unmatched.
meanings.sent3: The peacock's ostentatiousness in displaying its feathers captivated onlookers.
meanings.sent4: The ostentatiousness of the magician's tricks left the audience spellbound.
meanings.sent5: The ostentatiousness of the parade floats dazzled the spectators.
